name: eqnetrri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wne(c2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wne(c2, c1)

|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wne(c2, c1)
-| wceq(c2, c0)

comment: Substitution of equal classes into an inequality. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)
